  • Constructor Details

    • Host

      public Host(int port, GameController gameController, GameBoard gameBoard, MainGame view) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Host instance.
      Parameters:
      port - the port number on which the server will listen for connections
      gameController - the GameController managing game logic
      gameBoard - the GameBoard representing the state of the game
      view - the MainGame view for updating the UI
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating the server socket

  • Method Details

    • getConnectedClients

      public List<Socket> getConnectedClients()
      Returns the list of connected client sockets.
      Returns:
      a List of Socket objects representing connected clients

    • startServer

      public void startServer(GameState initialState)
      Starts the server to listen for incoming client connections.
      Parameters:
      initialState - the initial GameState to send to newly connected clients

    • sendGameState

      public void sendGameState(ObjectOutputStream out, GameState gameState)
      Sends the current game state to a specific client.
      Parameters:
      out - the ObjectOutputStream to send data to the client
      gameState - the GameState to send

    • getOutputStreams

      public List<ObjectOutputStream> getOutputStreams()
      Returns the list of output streams for all connected clients.
      Returns:
      a List of ObjectOutputStream objects for broadcasting messages

    • broadcastGameState

      public void broadcastGameState(GameState gameState)
      Broadcasts the current game state to all connected clients.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the GameState to broadcast

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the server and disconnects all connected clients.
